text: [[img:icon_books_of_nagash]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Seek out the eight[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_books_of_nagash]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_books_of_nagash}}]]Books of Nagash[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]by occupying the settlements and defeating the characters that harbour them to gain great powers.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_jars]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Use[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_canopic_jars]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_canopic_jars}}]]Canopic Jars[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]gathered throughout your campaign along with money and resources to craft powerful items and awaken[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_regiments_of_renown]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_regiments_of_renown}}]]Regiments of Renown[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_mortuary_cult]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_mortuary_cult}}]]Mortuary Cult.[[/tooltip]][[/url]]\\n\\n[[img:unit_capacity]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Construct military buildings to recruit units without financial cost or upkeep via their[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_day_of_awakening]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_day_of_awakening}}]]Day of Awakening[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], increasing recruitment capacities with each building constructed.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_tmb_dynasty]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Research[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_dynasties]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_dynasties}}]]dynastic technologies[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]to unlock powerful Lords and increase the number of Heroes that you can field.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]Gain additional troops by defeating Human or Elven armies or by killing certain Monsters in battle.[[/col]]\\n\\nLearn more about Tomb Kings [[url:script_link_campaign_tomb_kings]]here[[/url]].
The Dread King has returned to his kingdom, and so the city-states are restored to their former glory. The pyramids grow tall, and desert fauna grows tall through his power.
The Legions of Terror are vast and growing larger by the day. The veterans of long forgotten battles awaken to serve their Dark Lord once more.

Let the world tremble with fear, for the armies of darkness are coming. Infused with dark magic, the phalanxes are as unyielding as mountains, the cavalry as sweeping as avalanches, and the quivers inexhaustible.
With hideous necromatic rituals, the followers of Nagash cover the world with dark magic. The land is transformed into a nightmare where death reigns supreme and the Undead are invigorated.
